segments.text: In this kitchen, the woman is drying a plate, unaware of everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad she doesn't see the trouble building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool could fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so far into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks hopeful, but this might end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tipping; it's heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle on the floor means slips and accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is serene, but inside it's tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the family; they deserve better care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This unnoticed chaos could lead to real sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they just be safe and happy?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a pity no one's watching out for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies aren't worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR
